group_1.textLeft: The end of this term...@Hotaru took first place this time.

group_1.textRight: [chara:800202:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]On the test?

group_1.textLeft: Even in our grade...@She's at the top of every subject in our entire grade.

group_1.textRight: You gotta be kidding...@And she's always been on the verge of failing...

group_1.textLeft: Speaking of subjects, she didn't even sleep during@the entire test...

group_1.textRight: These guys just don't understand her.

group_1.textLeft: Well, what's normal is normal to them,@so I don't think they would.

group_1.textRight: How do you avoid failing even when you sleep@during class and tests?
I've already gone red in two subjects...

group_1.textLeft: How, you aaask...?@'Caaause it's a pain getting red marks～...
I answer just enough to not fail@so I can go back to sleeeep～...

group_1.textRight: Seriously...? How can you do that?
...Mind if I see your answer sheet?

group_1.textLeft: Mm～... Knock yourself ouuut～...

group_1.textRight: Whoa... It's true...
She solves just enough problems to pass@with a safe grade...
On top of that, every single answer she DID write@is correct...

group_1.textLeft: If she wants something done,@she's the girl to get it done...

group_1.textRight: The problem is she doesn't have any motivation...

group_1.textLeft: (Maybe this will put Akari in a good mood...)

group_1.textRight: ...No wonder there's rumors that you're another@person...

group_1.textLeft: Is that so...? I'm just trying my hardest.

group_1.textCenter: Pardon me folks! Is there a Hotaru Yura here?!

group_1.textRight: Someone's calling for you.
Is that a middle school girl...? Friend of yours?

group_1.textLeft: No one I know...
...Need me for something?

group_1.textRight: In front of the art roomー@I saw your painting posted up on the wall!
Alina-senpai was so interested in it,
so I got super curious what kind of person painted it!

group_1.textLeft: ...Alina-senpai? Alina Gray...?

group_1.textRight: That's right! And it's very rare of her!

group_1.textLeft: Is that so... I didn't paint anything particularly@interesting though.

group_1.textRight: I want to hear all about it!

group_1.textLeft: ...Sure thing.

group_1.textRight: Thanks a bunch!
I'll use this for reference next time@and get Alina-senpai's approval.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, give it your all...

group_1.textRight: Alina Gray... The rumored genius artist...?

group_1.textLeft: It's no rumor, she's for real.@She's got her own exhibit at the art gallery.

group_1.textRight: [chara:800301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! That's incredible, Hotaru!

group_1.textLeft: ...Hmm?

group_1.textRight: You don't have any interest in this either?

group_1.textLeft: I guess I'm uninterested in ratings and reputation...
Besides sleeping, I have no care in the world...

group_1.textRight: What about Akari?

group_1.textLeft: She's cute...@[chara:304801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:304801:cheek_0][chara:304801:face_mtn_ex_000.exp3.json:motion_100][chara:304801:lipSynch_1]My mistake, she's dependable.

group_1.textRight: You like her?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.

group_1.textRight: How about us?

group_1.textLeft: ...You're asking me that yourself...?

group_1.textRight: Only because I already know you like us.

group_1.textLeft: ...You're right. My friends and family are important.
So I think it's alright to put a little bit of hard work in.
...[wait:1.0][chara:304801:cheek_0][chara:304801:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json][chara:304801:lipSynch_1]Oh...
I still have my class duties to take care of.@I'm heading to the staff room.
